title: Ministry Monday #1
description:
MINISTRY MONDAYS

You've all been asking about the From Beer to Eternity remix album... well... i'm finally releasing it...for FREE! All I ask is that you like my Alien Jourgensen and Ministry fan pages on Facebook AND hit up my Twitter @alfknjourgensen. How easy was that... one new track gets released EVERY Monday (along with some extras here on the Pirate Bay) and will be released in the same order as on the album. If that weren't enough...we're gonna do the same with the Relapse remixxxes after From Beer to Eternity's are all done... so download away..

-Uncle Al
www.alfuckingjourgensen.com

Includes:

Special Message from Uncle Al
Hail to His Majesty (badmuthafucka mix)
Behind the scenes footage of Al before
he does the weather on TV.
Rig images and message from Sammy D (Ministry engineer) w/
images of the rig he used to remix.
